Articles.Content:
Hello There!

This has probably already been asked before but it would but nice to have some sort of procedural engines system with realistic engine stats. When working with things such as RO, mods like procedural parts and wings are useful, but but only if you can find engines that work with them, which is not very easy. Again this is just a request so I don't want any of you great modders out there to feel pressured.

~plasmeus~
